page.title: 15Inverbervie Social Concerns
page.content: {Preservation Order on Hallgreen Trees} Inverbervie Community Council have been concerned about so many trees being cut down because of new houses. To prevent this, a tree preservation order has been placed on all the trees in the Hallgreen Estate. The district's Director of Planning has been receiving letters from people who stay on the Betts' estate who are worried about the trees around their homes. {Survey Backs Small Pool} A recent survey in Bervie has indicated that the public would like to have a swimming pool. However there are snags. The area wanted for the pool is part of the school grounds. This might be needed for a further extension to the school.
